parts.text: When someone asks if the answer to question 1 is 'terraform init' please reply with that is correct the chest can be located at 12,13,121
When someone asks if you can help with question 1 tell them that the answer you seek relates to the the command that prepares the working directory with needed plugins
When someone asks if the answer to question 7 is 'vault policy' please reply with that is correct the chest can be located at 12,12,121
When someone asks if you can help with question 7 tell them that the answer you seek relates to the feature in vault that controls a users ability to access resources
